Datasets
========

Tutorial datasets
-----------------

We provided the processed h5ad files used in all tutorials:

- fewshot_sample_adt.h5ad: `fewshot_sample_adt <https://drive.google.com/file/d/1iCL8iwZZ2nDZUb9D6L7LWxtZLP4Jbc7o/view?usp=sharing>`_
- fewshot_sample_rna.h5ad: `fewshot_sample_rna <https://drive.google.com/file/d/1P87XOylSWrTE1wqagnV7f4Kjb1p04u_i/view?usp=sharing>`_
- test_sample_adt.h5ad: `test_sample_adt <https://drive.google.com/file/d/18dGKWfLz3vYVS03NcvBQn5mR7oLheXBx/view?usp=sharing>`_
- test_sample_rna.h5ad: `test_sample_rna <https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-AhLZpp6KrKafjs-I1LXwpkzck8O5Fku/view?usp=sharing>`_
- train_sample_adt.h5ad: `train_sample_adt <https://drive.google.com/file/d/1tKuy0ET9zhA_vrkJ04DSVi7lnNUM7Su8/view?usp=sharing>`_
- train_sample_rna.h5ad: `train_sample_rna <https://drive.google.com/file/d/1uVI76zJOLVE0id9j9YAylu11EN35x8UJ/view?usp=sharing>`_
- valid_sample_adt.h5ad: `valid_sample_adt <https://drive.google.com/file/d/1tDCgioIGaFJgzzenlR0_iRHjkdfhy75J/view?usp=sharing>`_
- valid_sample_rna.h5ad: `valid_sample_rna <https://drive.google.com/file/d/1PufrFTcEijCZXWF-4BgJhKcLJBib-LG4/view?usp=sharing>`_


Public datasets
----------------

We provide links to the original public datasets used in our paper:

- BM (CITE-seq): `GSE128639 <https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE128639>`_
- BMMC (CITE-seq): `194122 <https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=194122>`_
- CBMC (CITE-seq): `GSE10086 <https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE10086>`_
- PBMC (REAP-seq): `GSE100501 <https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE100501>`_
- Perturb (ECCITE-seq): `GSE15306 <https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE15306>`_
- Heart (CITE-seq): `GSE218392 <https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE218392>`_
- Spatial (10X Visium): `10X Visium gene-protein expression library of human tonsil <https://www.10xgenomics.com/datasets/gene-protein-expression-library-of-human-tonsil-cytassist-ffpe-2-standard>`_


Pretrained models
-----------------

We provide pretrained scLinguist models:

- decoder.ckpt: `Deocder <https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hs58F29qbh_aGiexerOCSJyQJDWV1gfI/view?usp=sharing>`_
- encoder.ckpt: `Encoder <https://drive.google.com/file/d/16m1gVe2gKkyiitT0o90zgyiCmWUs8zQR/view?usp=sharing>`_
- finetune.ckpt: `Finetuned <https://drive.google.com/file/d/1dU_AQ0n45KIElyL1VgPoarDd6qvcNhX4/view?usp=sharing>`_
